Title: Parenthesis
References: ŠTULAJTEROVÁ, A., JESENSKÁ, P.: English Stylistics. 1. vyd. Banská Bystrica : Univerzita Mateja Bela, 2013. 114 s.
Content:
Parenthesis is a variant of detached construction. It consists of an explanatory word, phrase, clause or a sentence .

It is indicated by a characteristic intonation and in writing by commas, brackets or dashes.

example:

  • When I was a boy - eighteen, nineteen - I was already on the road.
  • He gave me nice bonus (500€).
